# GET /v1/subscriptionOfferCodes/{id}/relationships/oneTimeUseCodes | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/subscriptionOfferCodes/{id}/relationships/oneTimeUseCodes ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-oneTimeUseCodes)

-  GET /v1/subscriptionOfferCodes/{id}/relationships/oneTimeUseCodes 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/subscriptionOfferCodes/{id}/relationships/oneTimeUseCodes

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-oneTimeUseCodes#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/subscriptionOfferCodes/{id}/relationships/oneTimeUseCodes
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-oneTimeUseCodes#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-oneTimeUseCodes#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-oneTimeUseCodes#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[SubscriptionOfferCodeOneTimeUseCodesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionoffercodeonetimeusecodeslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-oneTimeUseCodes#see-also)

### [Managing One-Time Use Offer Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionOfferCodes-_id_-relationships-oneTimeUseCodes#Managing-One-Time-Use-Offer-Codes)

[`Create One-Time Use Offer Codes`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-subscriptionoffercodeonetimeusecodes)Create one-time use codes for an auto-renewable subscription offer.[`Read One-Time Use Offer Code Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionoffercodeonetimeusecodes-_id_)Get details about a specific one-time use offer code for an auto-renewable subscription.[`Deactivate One-Time Use Offer Codes`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-subscriptionoffercodeonetimeusecodes-_id_)Deactivate a batch of one-time use offer codes for an auto-renewable subscription.[`List All One-Time Use Offer Codes for an Auto-Renewable Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionoffercodes-_id_-onetimeusecodes)Get details about a one-time use code for a specific subscription offer for an auto-renewable subscription.[`List One-Time Use Offer Code Values`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionoffercodeonetimeusecodes-_id_-values)Get a list of one-time use offer codes for an auto-renewable subscription in CSV format.
